    CodeDisplay
    171258008Up-to-date with immunizations
    171279008Immunization due
    171259000Not up to date with immunizations (finding)

name: ImmunizationForecastStatusObservationValue
title: immunizationForecastStatusObservationValue
description: Represents the patient's status with respect to their immunization guideline as of an evaluation date.
